name: Galaxy Shooter (iphelex)
description:
Thrilling infinite shooter to combat enemies. Fury Mode is a supreme speed test!
Classic 2D Infinite shooting arcade to bring to you the thrill of taking down enemy space-ships while dodging bullets, extra-terrestrial objects and gathering power-ups. Unlock your way to face the Fury mode, an ultimate test of your speed and strategy, all in a thrilling setting and with your very own collected premium spaceships. Let the battle begin in one of the most challenging high scoring games!  

*HOW TO PLAY*
Basic Controls - 

Move spaceship left - A/Left Arrow

Move Spaceship right - D/Right Arrow

Shoot - Space

Don't let any Spaceship pass, or their bullets hit you, they will cost you a life. Asteroids hit will also cost a life. Shoot the spaceships to destroy them, while shoot the power ups to get a lead over them. 
Reach higher scores to unlock the ultimate challenge of Fury Mode, which will open your universe to newer spaceships with unique bullets and animations.

*SHOP* 
Reach higher scores to unlock  many great FREE spaceships with unique bullets and sounds to conquer the galaxy in style!

*FURY MODE*
Bored of starting slow? Unlock the fury mode to start the game with godspeed. Reach higher scores in this mode to unlock the best spaceships in the universe.
